body.p: William Heusey States that he lives about 2 1/2 miles from where H. B. Margolyes formally lived and kept Tavern near Bennetsville Ky and that he sold the said Margolyes. corn at Several times for his Tavern and has eat himself with said Margolyes, and always found plenty Good & substantial food for man & horse. Given under my hand this 21st Nov 1861
Sworn to before me this 21st November 1861
Edward Pate J P. B. C
